title: Reverse italic
content: I am looking for font with reverse italic. Like Brown from Lineto, or Venus from Linotype. Do you have any suggestions for more of them? thank you
author: qymp

comments.content:
In case it helps your searching, I recently saw this called "ritalic".

hhp
I've noticed that the italic of many Hebrew fonts is slanted the same way as Roman italic. I thought that was odd and incorrect.

I've been asking people like Oded Ezer about that for a while. To my surprise (although not total displeasure) people I trust often say it's OK.

hhp
